tool.name: Beacon2 Sequence
tool.description: ÙŽQuery for the existence of a specified sequence at a given genomic position
tool.command: beacon2-search sequence --db-host '$db_host' --db-port $db_port --database '$database' --collection '$collection' --advance-connection --db-auth-config '$credentials' --alternateBases '$alternateBases' --referenceBases '$referenceBases' #if str($advanced_settings.referenceName) --referenceName '$advanced_settings.referenceName' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.start) --start $advanced_settings.start #end if #if str($advanced_settings.collectionIds) --collectionIds '$advanced_settings.collectionIds' #end if > sequenced_query_findings.json

param.label: REFERENCENAME
param.help: Reference name in numbers chr1/1, chr2/2, chr3/3, etc.

tool.help: Sequence Queries query for the existence of a specified sequence at a given genomic position. Such queries correspond to the original Beacon queries and are used to match short, precisely defined genomic variants such as SNVs and INDELs.
